name: Remove Checker BG
description: If checked, will removed the checker background

name: Remove Color Changing BG
description: If checked, will removed the color changing background

name: Enable Double-Tapping Safe
description: Prevents you from accidentally going to the noteskin state, when pressing the [Tab] or [Shift] key

name: Enable Change Skins Mid-Song
description:
If checked, allows the skin to change texture mid-song.
 Meaning it won't be constant throughout the song

name: Disable Display Animation
description: Disables the animations for display icons

name: Song Select:
description: Select the background song to play
